com.mostc.pftt.runner
Class LocalPhptTestPackRunner

java.lang.Object
  com.mostc.pftt.runner.AbstractTestPackRunner
      com.mostc.pftt.runner.PhptTestPackRunner
          com.mostc.pftt.runner.LocalPhptTestPackRunner

public class LocalPhptTestPackRunner
extends PhptTestPackRunner

Runs PHPTs from a given PhptTestPack. Can either run all PHPTs from the test pack, or PHPTs matching a set of names or name fragments.

Author:
Matt Ficken
